sentences.en: Against it, parakeets and toucans and blue - winged macaws swoop.
sentences.cn: 晨光下, 小鹦鹉、巨嘴鸟和翅膀鲜蓝的金刚鹦鹉展翼翱翔.

sentences.en: All our problems were solved in one fell swoop.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的问题一下子全都解决了.

sentences.en: And then she added with a sudden swoop to earth,'sebastian drinks too much! "
sentences.cn: 接着,她忽然急转直下,出其不意地说, “ 塞巴斯蒂安酒喝得太多了. ”

sentences.en: But afterwards changed the motionless industry to succeed atone fell swoop.
sentences.cn: 而后来转向不动产业一举成功.

sentences.en: Euphoric, he even thought he might settle all his problems in one fell swoop.
sentences.cn: 兴致一高, 他甚至想也许能够一举把所有的问题都解决.

sentences.en: He lost all his wealth all at one swoop.
sentences.cn: 他一下子失去了所有的财产.

sentences.en: It seemed that the plane was going to swoop down and strafe the town, so we dived for cover.
sentences.cn: 飞机看起来好像要俯冲下来轰炸小镇，所以我们赶紧蹲下躲避。

sentences.en: It'seemed the plane was going to swoop down and strafe the town.
sentences.cn: 那飞机似乎要向下俯冲并且猛烈炮轰这个城镇.

sentences.en: The eagle hovered, ready to swoop at any moment.
sentences.cn: 鹰在天空盘旋，随时准备俯冲下来。

sentences.en: The eagle poised in mid - air ready to swoop on its prey.
sentences.cn: 那鹰在 半空 中盘旋准备扑向猎物.

sentences.en: The hawk poised in mid-air ready to swoop.
sentences.cn: 老鹰在半空中盘旋，准备俯冲。

sentences.en: The hawks would swoop down on the pigeons on the street.
sentences.cn: 这些鹰会扑向马路上的鸽子.

sentences.en: The plane made a swoop over the city.
sentences.cn: 那架飞机突然向这座城市猛降下来.

sentences.en: The tornado destroyed the whole city at one fell swoop.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风一下子就毁了整个城市.

sentences.en: We decided to swoop down upon the enemy there.
sentences.cn: 我们决定突袭驻在那里的敌人.

sentences.en: With a swoop of his shining ax , the third tree fell.
sentences.cn: 这第三个樵夫看也不看它的说, 任何一棵树都行.

trans.tran_en: a sudden surprise attack on a place in order to get something or take people away – used especially in news reports
if a bird or aircraft swoops, it moves suddenly down through the air, especially in order to attack something
